# City Council

![City of Leadville Ward Map, Color Coded](https://www.leadville-co.gov/sites/g/files/vyhlif14096/files/styles/full_node_primary_extra_wide/public/media/city-council/image/5151/2021_updated_ward_map.jpg?itok=AuZgbHYU)

The City of Leadville is a statutory city. Its corporate authority is vested in the mayor and city council, together with such other officers as are provided for in Chapter 2.04 of the Leadville Municipal Code.

The city council consists of the Mayor and six council members elected from the city's three wards. Its powers include managing and controlling the finances and all real and personal property belonging to the city. For more information about the city council's duties and responsibilities, see [Chapter 2.04](https://library.municode.com/co/leadville/codes/code_of_ordinances?nodeId=TIT2ADPE_CH2.04ELOF "(opens in a new window)") of the Leadville Municipal Code.

**If you would like to address all of the City Council members at once, please use the following email:** [**LeadvilleCouncil@leadville-co.gov**](mailto:LeadvilleCouncil@leadville-co.gov)**.**

## City Council Meetings

**The City of Leadville Council meets on the 1st and 3rd Tuesdays of the month at 6 pm.** 

**This meeting will be held in person and via Google Meet**

 **Regular City Council Meeting**

**Google Meet joining info**

**Video call link:** [**https://meet.google.com/ojb-axgy-hma**](https://meet.google.com/ojb-axgy-hma "(opens in a new window)")

**Or dial: ‪(US) +1 916-836-2645‬ PIN: ‪744 519 909‬#**

[View PDF](https://www.leadville-co.gov/print/pdf/node/886)
